general_admission_process.title: Online Application Registration
general_admission_process.description: Candidate registers on the official college admission portal using a valid email ID and mobile number.

general_admission_process.title: Application Form Filling
general_admission_process.description: Candidate fills personal details, academic history, course preferences, and uploads required documents.

general_admission_process.title: Application Fee Payment
general_admission_process.description: Candidate pays the application fee online using UPI, debit card, credit card, or net banking.

general_admission_process.title: Application Submission
general_admission_process.description: Candidate reviews and submits the completed application form.

entrance_exam_process.title: Entrance Exam Registration
entrance_exam_process.description: Candidate registers for the relevant entrance examination as per course requirements.

entrance_exam_process.title: Admit Card Download
entrance_exam_process.description: Candidate downloads the entrance exam admit card from the official website.

entrance_exam_process.title: Entrance Examination
entrance_exam_process.description: Candidate appears for the entrance exam on the scheduled date and time.

entrance_exam_process.title: Result Declaration
entrance_exam_process.description: Entrance exam results are announced and made available to candidates.

merit_based_admission_process.title: Merit List Preparation
merit_based_admission_process.description: Merit list is prepared based on qualifying examination marks.

merit_based_admission_process.title: Merit List Publication
merit_based_admission_process.description: Merit list is published on the official college website.

merit_based_admission_process.title: Seat Allotment
merit_based_admission_process.description: Seats are allotted based on merit rank and course availability.

counselling_process.title: Counselling Registration
counselling_process.description: Eligible candidates register for counselling through the admission portal.

counselling_process.title: Choice Filling
counselling_process.description: Candidates select preferred courses and specializations.

counselling_process.title: Seat Allotment
counselling_process.description: Seats are allotted based on rank, preferences, and seat availability.

counselling_process.title: Seat Confirmation
counselling_process.description: Candidate confirms the allotted seat by paying the seat confirmation fee.

document_verification_process.title: Document Upload
document_verification_process.description: Candidate uploads scanned copies of required documents on the portal.

document_verification_process.title: Physical Verification
document_verification_process.description: Candidate reports to the campus or designated center for physical document verification.

document_verification_process.title: Verification Approval
document_verification_process.description: Documents are verified and approved by the admission office.

fee_payment_process.title: Fee Structure Review
fee_payment_process.description: Candidate reviews the detailed fee structure for the selected course.

fee_payment_process.title: Installment Selection
fee_payment_process.description: Candidate selects available installment options, if applicable.

fee_payment_process.title: Fee Payment
fee_payment_process.description: Candidate pays the tuition and associated fees online.

fee_payment_process.title: Payment Confirmation
fee_payment_process.description: Fee payment receipt is generated and sent to the registered email ID.

hostel_admission_process.title: Hostel Application
hostel_admission_process.description: Candidate applies for hostel accommodation through the hostel portal.

hostel_admission_process.title: Room Allotment
hostel_admission_process.description: Hostel rooms are allotted based on availability and candidate preference.

hostel_admission_process.title: Hostel Fee Payment
hostel_admission_process.description: Candidate pays hostel and mess fees.

scholarship_process.title: Scholarship Application
scholarship_process.description: Eligible candidates apply for institutional or government scholarships.

scholarship_process.title: Document Submission
scholarship_process.description: Candidate submits income and category certificates.

scholarship_process.title: Scholarship Approval
scholarship_process.description: Scholarship committee verifies and approves eligible applications.

phd_admission_process.title: Research Proposal Submission
phd_admission_process.description: Candidate submits a detailed research proposal in the chosen domain.

phd_admission_process.title: Research Aptitude Test
phd_admission_process.description: Candidate appears for a written research aptitude test.

phd_admission_process.title: Personal Interview
phd_admission_process.description: Candidate attends an interview with the research committee.

phd_admission_process.title: Final Selection
phd_admission_process.description: Final admission decision is communicated to selected candidates.

international_student_process.title: International Application Submission
international_student_process.description: International candidates submit applications through the international admissions portal.

international_student_process.title: Offer Letter Issuance
international_student_process.description: Offer letter is issued upon eligibility verification.

international_student_process.title: Visa Processing
international_student_process.description: Candidate applies for a student visa using the offer letter.

international_student_process.title: Arrival and Registration
international_student_process.description: Candidate reports to the campus and completes registration formalities.

post_admission_process.title: Student ID Generation
post_admission_process.description: Student ID and institutional email ID are generated.

post_admission_process.title: Orientation Program
post_admission_process.description: Student attends orientation and induction program.

post_admission_process.title: Commencement of Classes
post_admission_process.description: Academic sessions begin as per the academic calendar.
